User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user profile, who is also a designer.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

coverPhotoURL.description: URL of the user's cover photo.

bio.description: A short biography of the designer.

subscriberCount.description: Number of users following this designer.

followers.description: List of UIDs of users who follow this designer.

designerId.description: UID of the user who created the project.

imageUrl.description: URL of the project's main image.

imageUrls.description: Array of URLs for the project's images.

tools.description: Tools used to create the project.

viewCount.description: Number of times the project has been viewed.

likeCount.description: Number of likes for the project.

likes.description: List of UIDs of users who liked this project.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a direct message between two users.

content.description: The text content of the message.

isRead.description: Whether the message has been read by the receiver.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

userId.description: UID of the user who receives the notification.

senderId.description: UID of the user who triggered the notification.

senderPhotoURL.description: Profile picture URL of the sender.

isRead.description: Whether the notification has been read.

projectId.description: Optional ID of the relevant project (for likes).

projectName.description: Optional name of the relevant project.

messageSnippet.description: A short snippet of the message.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores all user profiles. The document ID is the user's Firebase Auth UID.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores all portfolio projects created by users.

/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores all direct messages between users.
